i can keep on changing the song

til i finally land on one

but it dont change gone wont bring her back

verse 2
i can keep on hanging around

strike a match and burn it down
walk out and leave it laying
dont think about a thing just drive
far enough til i find a change of scene
a new routine id try anything

chorus
but it dont change gone wont bring her back
shes moved on and im stuck with that

but it dont change
see jason aldean liveget tickets as low as 41you might also likebridge

outro
yeah i could change whatever i want

no it dont change gone1embed
